content.title: Pixel-Lobster
content.description: A fun project I started with my friend's help. I combined my love for pixel art and my goal to get better at front-end development into this little project, using React and Typescript.

content.title: Portfolio
content.description: Taking on a retro-gaming vibe, I designed this little portfolio to show off what I have learnt and tell a little story about myself. Hope it does a better job than just sending out my CV!

content.title: Ludum Dare 55 - GameJam
content.description: In a collaboration with a few friends, we are taking part in the celebrated game jam to see what we end up with!
